lines.text: Meditating on mountains sure is peaceful, except when nosey trainers come up here to catch Pokemon!
Why waste time sitting on a mountain thinking when you can catch Pokemon!
It does not matter if the glass is half empty or half full.
As long as there is something to drink, I'm fine with it!
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift.
That's why they call it the present.
